programme.title: Planet America
programme.desc: From bunker-busting bombs to F-bombs, Trump lashes out at Israel and Iran over ceasefire violations. Plus leaked intelligence disputes Trumps claim that US bombs "obliterated" Irans nuclear sites. (Midseason Final)

programme.title: Take 5 With Zan Rowe
programme.desc: Bill Bailey captures humanity across five songs, taking you back to his childhood days, the recent loss of a deep friendship, and the song he wants played at his funeral.

programme.title: Little Disasters
programme.desc: Police and Social Services investigate jointly. The friendship group fractures on a past holiday.

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: Ros Childs presents the leading news at lunchtime, including the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter.

programme.title: Bay of Fires
programme.desc: Tensions rise to boiling as Stella scrambles, again, to adapt to her new way of life - but when someone escapes the towns clutches, it begs the question; If they can leave, why cant Stella?

programme.title: Fake or Fortune?
programme.desc: Charles Henty has been left with a working farm to run in France and a crippling inheritance tax bill to pay. The only way he can do that is by selling two paintings he owns - if he can prove theyre genuine.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: In Claire Hoopers House of Games this week, stage star Lucy Durack, horticulturist Jamie Durie, and comedians Dilruk Jayasinha and Lizzy Hoo compete for the grand prize - a trophy or a spoon holder that looks like a crab.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: Kate Ritchie grew up in front of the nation. She was cast as Sally on Home and Away and played the role for two decades, with her own experiences reflected in her character. Anh must capture her warmth and authenticity.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team come to the aid of wounded war hero Luke Simpson, who lost his leg on his last tour of duty. Luke has always been a keen gardener but has struggled to create a garden of his dreams.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: The story of a mother unable to forgive herself for giving away her daughter more than forty years ago, and a son who needs to understand why his mother was unable to keep him.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team of experts visit Layer Marney Tower in Essex. Among the objects under scrutiny is the first aid box that accompanied Shackleton on his Endurance expedition to the Antarctic in 1914.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: In Claire Hoopers House of Games, stage star Lucy Durack, horticulturist Jamie Durie, and comedians Dilruk Jayasinha and Lizzy Hoo compete for the grand prize - a trophy or a spoon holder that looks like a crab. (Final)

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.sub-title: Winter: Escape to the Tropics and Native Colour
programme.desc: Costa picks plants for winter colour, Jerry has the latest on the fire ant outbreak, Sophie meets a local garden hero, Millie Ross grows bare root plants.

programme.title: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: Helen is missing as the countdown to day seven nears. Will Helen be the next victim?

programme.title: Gruen
programme.desc: The Gruen team solve one of lifes great mysteries. What has more layers, Westpacs scam protection or Kleenexs new luxury tissue? Plus, we juggle chainsaws. Wil, Todd and Russel are joined by Carolyn Miller and Liana Rossi.

programme.title: Guy Montgomerys Guy Mont-Spelling Bee
programme.desc: Denise Scott, Kirsty Webeck and Takashi Wakasugi and the current leading champion play as Guy insists they wear and spell unusual hats, and Aaron reveals his new Greengrocer business.

programme.title: Spicks and Specks
programme.desc: Natalie Bassingthwaighte, Nina Oyama, Sam Cromack and Steph Tisdell join Alan, Myf and Adam. Nina lives out her furry fantasies, Steph gets owned by Delta Goodrem and Sarah Blaskos performance will give you goosebumps.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the days events, explaining whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: After a surprising breakthrough in Jays case, Nikki struggles to accept that Scott may not be responsible. Meanwhile, DI Mason asks Jack and Nikki to investigate the death of someone close to the case.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going as the sun comes up with continuous music videos, from new releases to classics and the songs weve long forgotten.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: rage: Guest Programmer
programme.desc: After teaming up for their album Ill Times last year, GUM and Ambrose Kenny-Smith bring their collaborative powers to the rage couch!

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Mountain
programme.desc: An exploration of our obsessions with high places and how they have come to capture our imagination, with an original score from the Australian Chamber Orchestra.

programme.title: Jane Austen: Rise of a Genius
programme.desc: At 27, Jane Austen is still unpublished. But despite facing the loss of her father throwing her family into turmoil, she succeeds in publishing Sense and Sensibility, followed by the enormous success of Pride and Prejudice.

programme.title: Eumeralla, A War Requiem For Peace
programme.desc: Written and composed by Yorta Yorta soprano, composer and Artistic Director of Short Black Opera, Deborah Cheetham Fraillon AO, this requiem for peace, is sung entirely in the ancient dialects of the Gunditjmara people.

programme.title: Classic 100
programme.desc: The Classic 100 Concert returns to celebrate Australias favourite piano pieces, performed by the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra. Led by Benjamin Northey and a stellar lineup of guests including Andrea Lam from ABCs The Piano.

programme.title: Spicks and Specks
programme.desc: Natalie Bassingthwaighte, Nina Oyama, Sam Cromack and Steph Tisdell join Alan, Myf and Adam. Nina lives out her furry fantasies, Steph gets owned by Delta Goodrem and Sarah Blaskos performance will give you goosebumps.

programme.title: Landline
programme.desc: Navigating the complexities of carbon farming; and a top honour for a remote paramedic.

programme.title: Australian Story
programme.sub-title: Break It Down - The Raygun Phenomenon
programme.desc: Rachael "Raygun" Gunn broke the internet with her Olympic routine, sparking countless memes and vitriolic abuse. A year on, Australian Story asks what the hell was that all about?

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and top stories, with more reporters to tell you whats happening and why it matters. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: A suspicious death interrupts the Easter Fete. Alphy attempts to use the case as a distraction from his personal life.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: A death at the university plunges Geordie and Alphy into a world of academic adversaries. Alphy encounters a complication in his romantic life.

programme.title: Bay of Fires
programme.desc: Tensions rise to boiling as Stella scrambles, again, to adapt to her new way of life - but when someone escapes the towns clutches, it begs the question; If they can leave, why cant Stella?

programme.title: Little Disasters
programme.desc: Police and Social Services investigate jointly. The friendship group fractures on a past holiday.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Great Barrier Reef
programme.desc: David Attenborough travels to the stunning Osprey Reef where he dives in shark-infested waters, in a submersible, to see the animals that use Osprey to navigate huge distances to the Barrier Reef.

programme.title: rage: Guest Programmer
programme.desc: After teaming up for their album Ill Times last year, GUM and Ambrose Kenny-Smith bring their collaborative powers to the rage couch!

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Its the ultimate showdown between this weeks rage guest programmers bands. Who takes the crown? You decide!

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from new releases to classics and the long-forgotten.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday as Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you an engaging mix of the latest news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics, global affairs, culture and weather. Plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: David Speers is joined by a panel of leading political minds to discuss the week including the Israel-Iran ceasefire, Sussan Leys Press Club speech, inflation eases, social media age restrictions, NATO and defence spending.

programme.title: Offsiders
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel Gideon Haigh, Lydia Williams and Bianca Chatfield discuss the First Cricket Test in the West Indies, Joe Montemurros debut as Matildas coach, Gout Gouts European debut, Super Netball, AFL and NRL.

programme.title: The World This Week
programme.desc: Andrea Nierhoff brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Compass
programme.sub-title: Stan Grant On Country with Indira Naidoo
programme.desc: Aboriginal viewers are advised that following program contains images and voices of people who have died. Indira Naidoo in conversation with Stan Grant, exploring his deepening faith.

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: Celebrating 1900 years since the building of Hadrians Wall, the Rev. Kate Bottley visits Northumberland to unearth evidence of early Christianity at the nearby Roman settlement of Vindolanda.

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Landline
programme.desc: The electrician who swapped the city for farming free-range ducks: Analysing lentils using AI; Food insecurity issues inside a food production region; and celebrating 150 years of the Toganmain woolshed.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.sub-title: Winter: Escape to the Tropics and Native Colour
programme.desc: Costa picks plants for winter colour, Jerry has the latest on the fire ant outbreak, Sophie meets a local garden hero, Millie Ross grows bare root plants.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joanna Lumleys adventure continues in Austrias Wachau Valley with wineries and the Donau-Auen National Parks turtle conservation. She visits Bratislava and the Tatras, ending with ground squirrels in Muran National Park.

programme.title: Nigella Bites
programme.desc: Nigella immerses us in the world of comfort food, and where better to start than with the ultimate in pleasure on a plate - mashed potato. But Nigella has one strict rule.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of America
programme.desc: Martins travels take him to the San Juan Islands in Washington State, the Channel Islands National Park - known as Americas Galapagos - and Avery Island in the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: A young Albertosaurus, faster cousin of T-Rex, must learn to hunt with her ferocious pack. Inspired by real-life dig-site discoveries, stunning VFX brings her story to life.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner has anger management issues. His quiet life as a brilliant research scientist working with ex-girlfriend Betty Ross conceals a painful past. A freak lab accident reveals Bruces heroic impulses but also unleashes his inner demons. And he becomes the most powerful being on the face of the Earth: a superhero and a monster.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Forced into slavery by the corrupt heir to the throne, Roman general Maximus becomes a gladiator. His prowess in the arena leads him to Rome, the Colosseum, and a showdown with the new emperor.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Desperate to find their missing son, Paul and his wife Amanda trick eminent palaeontologist Dr Alan Grant into accompanying them to Isla Sorna. The small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crashlanding puts a father and son on a dangerous planet - Earth. Hunted by an alien and by evolved animal species, the pair must work together to survive.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Half-human, half-Atlantean Arthur Curry goes on a journey that will not only force him to face who he really is, but to discover if he is worthy of who he was born to be, a king.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that curses those who enter it with a violent death.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends head to a remote cabin where they discover the Book of the Dead, and they unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: This film re-creates the towering, true story of Alexander the Great, who, in the 4th Century BC, conquered Greece, Persia, Afghanistan and India - 90% of the "Known World." Against massive armies of chariots and elephants, he never lost a battle! Visionary, explorer, and dreamer - he was also a tender son, torn by his mothers burning love and ambition, and desperate for his fathers approval. His dream shaped the world we live in today.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: When a scientific expedition to an uncharted island awakens titanic forces of nature, a mission of discovery becomes an explosive war between monster and man.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Men in Black follows the exploits of Agents Kay and Jay, members of a top-secret organization established to monitor alien activity on Earth. The two MIB find themselves in the middle of a deadly plot by an intergalactic terrorist, who has arrived on Earth to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies. Kay and Jay face a simple imperative: track down the interloper or Earth will be destroyed. Its all in a days work for the Men in Black.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Mans greatest battle begins when an evil corporation attempts world domination by deploying an army of super villains to crush Peter Parker.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Set in ancient China, a mercenary travels east in search of gunpowder and discovers the mighty Great Wall and the terrible secret behind why it was built.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: When a chain of events finds the corpse of Imhotep resurrected in the British Museum, the mummy walks the Earth once more, determined to fulfil his quest for immortality. An even more powerful force born of the darkest rituals of ancient Egypt has also been set loose in the world. When these two forces clash, the fate of the world will hang in the balance, sending the OConnells on a desperate race to save the world.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: Based on the character created by bestselling author Tom Clancy, Jack Ryan is a global action thriller set in the present day. This original story follows a young Jack as he uncovers a financial terrorist plot. The story follows him from 9/11, through his tour of duty in Afghanistan, which scarred him forever, and into his early days in the Financial Intelligence Unit of the modern CIA where he becomes an analyst, under the guardianship of his handler, Harper. When Ryan believes hes uncovered a Russian plot to collapse the United States economy, he goes from being an analyst to becoming a spy and must fight to save his own life and those of countless others, while also trying to protect the thing thats more important to him than anything, his relationship with his fiancee Cathy.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters leader.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Before Blades mother gave birth to him, she was bitten by a vampire, which made Blade immune to vampires. Now a vampire hunter, Blade, joined by vampire detective Hannibal King and Dracula-descendent Frank Drake, slay vampires.

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: A family on a tropical holiday discover that the secluded beach where they are relaxing is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives to a single day.

programme.title: Dont Breathe
programme.desc: Rocky, a young woman wanting to start a better life for her and her sister, agrees to take part in the robbery of a house owned by a wealthy blind man with her boyfriend Money and their friend Alex. But when the blind man turns out to be a more than he seems, the group must find a way to escape his home before they become his newest victims.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been eight years since Batman vanished into the night, turning, in that instant, from hero to fugitive. Assuming the blame for the death of DA Harvey Dent, the Dark Knight sacrificed everything for what he and Commissioner Gordon both hoped was the greater good. For a time the lie worked, as criminal activity in Gotham City was crushed under the weight of the anti-crime Dent Act. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar with a mysterious agenda. Far more dangerous, however, is the emergence of Bane, a masked terrorist whose ruthless plans for Gotham drive Bruce out of his self-imposed exile. Even if he dons the cape and cowl again, Batman may be no match for Bane.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor Sully Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans are at war with the Transformers, and Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving the future lies buried in the secrets of the past and the hidden history of Transformers on Earth. Now, its up to the unlikely alliance of Cade Yeager, Bumblebee, an English lord and an Oxford professor to save the world.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A French drug kingpin offers a huge reward to anyone who can break him out of jail and only the LAPDs Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: The true meaning of family gets tested like never before as Dom Toretto takes the team on a worldwide ride with high-stakes action, old friends and a surprising new foe.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley, set out to bring down the bad guys. But when a terrible secret is revealed, it makes the Angels targets for assassination.

programme.title: Bad Boys For Life
programme.desc: The original Bad Boys are back! After a string of assassinations and an attempt on Mikes life, he convinces a hesitant Marcus to hold off retirement and partner one last time.

programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner has anger management issues. His quiet life as a brilliant research scientist working with ex-girlfriend Betty Ross conceals a painful past. programme.desc: Forced into slavery by the corrupt heir to the throne, Roman general Maximus becomes a gladiator. His prowess in the arena leads him to Rome, the Colosseum, and a showdown with the new emperor.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Desperate to find their missing son, Paul and his wife Amanda trick eminent palaeontologist Dr Alan Grant into accompanying them to Isla Sorna. The small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crashlanding puts a father and son on a dangerous planet - Earth. Hunted by an alien and by evolved animal species, the pair must work together to survive.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Half-human, half-Atlantean Arthur Curry goes on a journey that will not only force him to face who he really is, but to discover if he is worthy of who he was born to be, a king.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that curses those who enter it with a violent death.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends head to a remote cabin where they discover the Book of the Dead, and they unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: This film re-creates the towering, true story of Alexander the Great, who, in the 4th Century BC, conquered Greece, Persia, Afghanistan and India - 90% of the "Known World." Against massive armies of chariots and elephants, he never lost a battle! Visionary, explorer, and dreamer - he was also a tender son, torn by his mothers burning love and ambition, and desperate for his fathers approval. His dream shaped the world we live in today.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: When a scientific expedition to an uncharted island awakens titanic forces of nature, a mission of discovery becomes an explosive war between monster and man.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Men in Black follows the exploits of Agents Kay and Jay, members of a top-secret organization established to monitor alien activity on Earth. The two MIB find themselves in the middle of a deadly plot by an intergalactic terrorist, who has arrived on Earth to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies. Kay and Jay face a simple imperative: track down the interloper or Earth will be destroyed. Its all in a days work for the Men in Black.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Mans greatest battle begins when an evil corporation attempts world domination by deploying an army of super villains to crush Peter Parker.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Set in ancient China, a mercenary travels east in search of gunpowder and discovers the mighty Great Wall and the terrible secret behind why it was built.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: When a chain of events finds the corpse of Imhotep resurrected in the British Museum, the mummy walks the Earth once more, determined to fulfil his quest for immortality. An even more powerful force born of the darkest rituals of ancient Egypt has also been set loose in the world. When these two forces clash, the fate of the world will hang in the balance, sending the OConnells on a desperate race to save the world.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: Based on the character created by bestselling author Tom Clancy, Jack Ryan is a global action thriller set in the present day. This original story follows a young Jack as he uncovers a financial terrorist plot. The story follows him from 9/11, through his tour of duty in Afghanistan, which scarred him forever, and into his early days in the Financial Intelligence Unit of the modern CIA where he becomes an analyst, under the guardianship of his handler, Harper. When Ryan believes hes uncovered a Russian plot to collapse the United States economy, he goes from being an analyst to becoming a spy and must fight to save his own life and those of countless others, while also trying to protect the thing thats more important to him than anything, his relationship with his fiancee Cathy.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters leader.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Before Blades mother gave birth to him, she was bitten by a vampire, which made Blade immune to vampires. Now a vampire hunter, Blade, joined by vampire detective Hannibal King and Dracula-descendent Frank Drake, slay vampires.

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: A family on a tropical holiday discover that the secluded beach where they are relaxing is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives to a single day.

programme.title: Dont Breathe
programme.desc: Rocky, a young woman wanting to start a better life for her and her sister, agrees to take part in the robbery of a house owned by a wealthy blind man with her boyfriend Money and their friend Alex. But when the blind man turns out to be a more than he seems, the group must find a way to escape his home before they become his newest victims.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been eight years since Batman vanished into the night, turning, in that instant, from hero to fugitive. Assuming the blame for the death of DA Harvey Dent, the Dark Knight sacrificed everything for what he and Commissioner Gordon both hoped was the greater good. For a time the lie worked, as criminal activity in Gotham City was crushed under the weight of the anti-crime Dent Act. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar with a mysterious agenda. Far more dangerous, however, is the emergence of Bane, a masked terrorist whose ruthless plans for Gotham drive Bruce out of his self-imposed exile. Even if he dons the cape and cowl again, Batman may be no match for Bane.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor Sully Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans are at war with the Transformers, and Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving the future lies buried in the secrets of the past and the hidden history of Transformers on Earth. Now, its up to the unlikely alliance of Cade Yeager, Bumblebee, an English lord and an Oxford professor to save the world.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A French drug kingpin offers a huge reward to anyone who can break him out of jail and only the LAPDs Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: The true meaning of family gets tested like never before as Dom Toretto takes the team on a worldwide ride with high-stakes action, old friends and a surprising new foe.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley, set out to bring down the bad guys. But when a terrible secret is revealed, it makes the Angels targets for assassination.

programme.desc: When Gabi takes the case of a missing man on behalf of his mother, it causes disagreement among the team and leads to a shocking revelation.

programme.desc: Gabi and the team revisit a previous case involving child trafficking and their heated investigation leads them in a shocking direction.

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.sub-title: In Which The Larkins Are Determined To Convince Mariette To Stay
programme.desc: The Larkins go to extreme lengths to convince Mariette not to leave; the Angela Snow arrives and sets tongues wagging, adding extra fuel started by the Normans.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawleys head to Northumberland for a shooting party at a castle, before returning to Downton to celebrate Christmas.

programme.title: Inspector George Gently
programme.desc: When the body of a young woman is found murdered, Gently and Bacchus investigate a family with unimaginable secrets. But the investigation reveals far more alarming truths.

programme.title: Mum
programme.desc: Cathys clearing out her garage and the family come round to help. Her brother and his partner are fresh from playing golf and making friends with a millionaire. Kellys mum comes round to take an old fridge, and Cathy sees a new side to Kelly. Michael is helping out, too, and faces a decision.

programme.title: Bancroft
programme.desc: Bancroft is faced with a startling blast from the past, which brings the events from 1990 back to the surface. Meanwhile, Katherine wrestles with twists and turns of the new information she is uncovering.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Vera is called to the scene when the body of addiction support worker Angela Konan is found hidden among the bleak woodlands of Northumberland National Park. Vera and her team must pull back the layers of the introverted victims life to uncover her closely-guarded secrets and surprising depths, as it appears an increasingly erratic Angela clashed with two clients in the week before she died. One of whom, Beth Draper, talked to her daughter. Suspicions also turn to Drapers daughter, who went out the night Angela was murdered. Drapers brother in law, Duncan Maxwell, confessed to the murder, explaining that he felt raged over families of addicts not being cared for equally as the addicts themselves. He went back to Angelas cabin, but by then she had disappeared.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawleys head to Northumberland for a shooting party at a castle, before returning to Downton to celebrate Christmas.

programme.title: Ripper Street
programme.desc: It is Reids first day back at H Division and the police force he once commanded is now under Inspector Drakes authority. Despite his initial anxiety, it soon becomes clear that Reids investigative instinct is as sharp as ever. He is drawn to a distressed woman who claims to have lost her child from the workhouse, but when it becomes apparent that she is losing her wits he begins to question her testimony.

programme.title: The Larkins

programme.desc: The Larkins go to extreme lengths to convince Mariette not to leave; the Angela Snow arrives and sets tongues wagging, adding extra fuel started by the Normans.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawleys head to Northumberland for a shooting party at a castle, before returning to Downton to celebrate Christmas.

programme.title: Inspector George Gently
programme.desc: When the body of a young woman is found murdered, Gently and Bacchus investigate a family with unimaginable secrets. But the investigation reveals far more alarming truths.

programme.title: Mum
programme.desc: Cathys clearing out her garage and the family come round to help. Her brother and his partner are fresh from playing golf and making friends with a millionaire. Kellys mum comes round to take an old fridge, and Cathy sees a new side to Kelly. Michael is helping out, too, and faces a decision.

programme.title: Bancroft
programme.desc: Bancroft is faced with a startling blast from the past, which brings the events from 1990 back to the surface. Meanwhile, Katherine wrestles with twists and turns of the new information she is uncovering.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Vera is called to the scene when the body of addiction support worker Angela Konan is found hidden among the bleak woodlands of Northumberland National Park. Vera and her team must pull back the layers of the introverted victims life to uncover her closely-guarded secrets and surprising depths, as it appears an increasingly erratic Angela clashed with two clients in the week before she died. One of whom, Beth Draper, talked to her daughter. Suspicions also turn to Drapers daughter, who went out the night Angela was murdered. Drapers brother in law, Duncan Maxwell, confessed to the murder, explaining that he felt raged over families of addicts not being cared for equally as the addicts themselves. He went back to Angelas cabin, but by then she had disappeared.

programme.title: Downton Abbey

programme.title: Ripper Street
programme.desc: It is Reids first day back at H Division and the police force he once commanded is now under Inspector Drakes authority. Despite his initial anxiety, it soon becomes clear that Reids investigative instinct is as sharp as ever. programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: This programme goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victims lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of. But how many luxury homes and exotic cars does it take to justify these white collar crimes? Ultimately for the crooks the dream turns into a nightmare when their shady plans unravel. "American Greed" follows the money through the eyes of the criminals, the victims, and the investigators who bring these scammers to justice.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Arthur visits a psychiatrist and recalls via flashback a disturbing encounter with his dad that may explain Arthurs abrasive personality.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Holly asks Doug if she can get a raise for walking Arthur, while Carrie gets a promotion on being the project supervisor which changes her hours, so now Doug and Carrie get to hardly see each other.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.sub-title: The Joining Of Two Unlike Elements Is A Mixture
programme.desc: Drew stages a mock ceremony when Kate longs for a wedding.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who cant be stopped - but hes making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. But at the biggest nuptials of the year, John breaks the rules and falls for the daughter of the US Secretary of Treasury, and Jeremy is left at the mercy of her "stage-five-clinger" sister. Being there for his buddy, Jeremy follows John to the familys huge estate for a weekend that may even be too wild for these professional party guys.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A has-been scientist, Dr Rick Marshall, gets more than he bargained for when his expedition takes a wrong turn into the Land of the Lost. Now, Marshall, his crack-smart research assistant, Holly, and a redneck survivalist named Will have no weapons, few skills and questionable smarts to survive in a world full of marauding dinosaurs, fantastic creatures and laugh-out-loud comedy.

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: When Albert loses his girlfriend to his moustached nemesis, a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town and turns his luck around. But when her notorious outlaw husband arrives seeking revenge, Albert must put his new-found courage to the test.

programme.title: Starsky and Hutch
programme.desc: One of televisions most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken Hutch Hutchinson as theyre paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Land of the Lost

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Owen Wilson stars in this riotous comedy from the producers of The 40-Year-Old Virgin and the writers of Superbad. When three young students, Ryan (Troy Gentile), Wade (Nate Hartley) and Emmit (David Dorfman) attend their first day at high school they come across school bully, Filkins (Alex Frost) who channels Hannibal Lecter. Coming up with the idea of getting some protection from this maniac, they place an ad in Soldier of Fortune magazine looking for a bodyguard. Enter Drillbit Taylor (Wilson), not the best but definitely the cheapest of the mercenaries, hit men and bodyguards who respond. Drillbit is steely, dangerous and skilled in covert black-ops and exotic martial arts; hes also a complete fraud. Taylor enrols them in physical and mental training, steeling them, and possibly himself, for the ultimate clash against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Five former basketball teammates, after 30 years since graduating high school, gather at the lake house where they celebrated their biggest victory to mourn the passing of their late coach. Over the course of the Fourth of July weekend, the five friends realise that just because theyve all grown up and started families doesnt mean that theyve lost that old spark. Adulthood is what you make of it, and no one at the lake house is eager to be the grown up of the gang.

programme.title: Starsky and Hutch
programme.desc: One of televisions most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken Hutch Hutchinson as theyre paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his stepfather, Frank Powell, whos a real jerk. Frank picks on Rod, tosses him around like a rag doll in their weekly sparring sessions, and definitely doesnt respect him, much less his stunts - as he says, "you never sneak up on a man whos been in a chemical fire". But when Frank falls ill, its up to Rod to stage the stunt jump of his life in order to raise the money for Franks heart operation and save him.

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: The accidental secret agent returns, sent on a mission to stop a group of international assassins before they eliminate a Chinese leader and cause global chaos.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is a London museum guard sent to Los Angeles in charge of a priceless painting. Mayhem erupts when the famously eccentric simpleton is mistaken for an art expert.

programme.title: Kicking and Screaming
programme.desc: Phil Weston is a mild-mannered suburban dad - whos suddenly transformed into a caffeine-fuelled sports maniac when he becomes the coach of his sons unruly soccer team. But when the championship pits Phils underdog team against the squad coached by his own domineering dad, its game on for the most uproarious mismatch of the season.

programme.title: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
programme.desc: Theyve graduated and theyre loose on the streets! Somehow, the members of this oddball squad of eccentrics have earned their badges. Now on their first assignment, they must use all the wits in their relatively limited capacity to tackle hoodlums and a local gang. But they must also overcome the rogue officers within their own precinct who are trying to thwart their bumbling efforts.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investors adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his stepfather, Frank Powell, whos a real jerk. programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: He knows no fear. He knows no danger. He knows nothing! When the priceless Crown Jewels are stolen, bumbling Johnny English is the only secret agent in the country who can solve the crime. His prime suspects: a sinister businessman and a beautiful woman with a mysterious interest in Johnnys top-secret mission. Can the clueless super spy save the day without denting the nations pride, or his super-cool Aston Martin spy car?

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Clear the runway for Derek Zoolander, VH1s three-time male model of the year but his face falls when hippie-chic hes so hot right now Hansel scooters in to steal this years award. The evil fashion guru Mugatu seizes the opportunity to turn Derek into a killing machine. Its a well-designed conspiracy and only with the help of Hansel and a few well-chosen accessories can Derek make the world safe.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Hes the best there is. In fact, hes the only one there is! Hes Ace Ventura Pet Detective and hes on the case to find the Miami Dolphins missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eyeball to eyeball with a man-eating shark, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. Whether hes undercover, under fire or underwater, he always gets his man or beast.

programme.title: Wanderlust
programme.desc: After George is downsized from his financial firm and Lindas depressing documentary is cancelled, they can no longer afford their overpriced micro-loft in New York. They find themselves with just one option - to pack up their lives and head south to move in with Georges brother and his wife. George and Linda stumble upon Elysium, an idyllic community where the only rule is to be yourself.

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: Doug Harris is a loveable but socially awkward groom-to-be with a problem: he has no best man. With less than two weeks to go until he marries the girl of his dreams, Doug is referred to Jimmy Callahan, owner and CEO of Best Man, Inc., a company that provides flattering best men for socially challenged guys in need. What ensues is a hilarious wedding charade as they try to pull off the big con, and an unexpected budding bromance between Doug and his fake best man Jimmy.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasiers show is subjected to a focus group evaluation, and 11 of the 12 participants have nothing but rave reviews for his work. But one man just doesnt like him, throwing Frasier into a frenzy as he desperately tries to find out why.

programme.desc: A dazed Grace is rescued by a handsome Jewish doctor who pulls her up on his horse and delivers her just in time for her insemination with an impatient Will.

programme.title: Night Court
programme.desc: Dan (John Larroquette) slips into a coma after an amorous former girlfriend (Leslie Bevis) pays him a visit in the hospital.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: Jerry must be at his most creative when he has to explain to his visiting parents why he isnt wearing the watch they once gave him.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Arthur visits a psychiatrist and recalls via flashback a disturbing encounter with his dad that may explain Arthurs abrasive personality.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Holly asks Doug if she can get a raise for walking Arthur, while Carrie gets a promotion on being the project supervisor which changes her hours, so now Doug and Carrie get to hardly see each other.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.sub-title: The Joining Of Two Unlike Elements Is A Mixture
programme.desc: Drew stages a mock ceremony when Kate longs for a wedding.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who cant be stopped - but hes making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. But at the biggest nuptials of the year, John breaks the rules and falls for the daughter of the US Secretary of Treasury, and Jeremy is left at the mercy of her "stage-five-clinger" sister. Being there for his buddy, Jeremy follows John to the familys huge estate for a weekend that may even be too wild for these professional party guys.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A has-been scientist, Dr Rick Marshall, gets more than he bargained for when his expedition takes a wrong turn into the Land of the Lost. Now, Marshall, his crack-smart research assistant, Holly, and a redneck survivalist named Will have no weapons, few skills and questionable smarts to survive in a world full of marauding dinosaurs, fantastic creatures and laugh-out-loud comedy.

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: When Albert loses his girlfriend to his moustached nemesis, a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town and turns his luck around. But when her notorious outlaw husband arrives seeking revenge, Albert must put his new-found courage to the test.

programme.title: Starsky and Hutch
programme.desc: One of televisions most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken Hutch Hutchinson as theyre paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. But at the biggest nuptials of the year, John breaks the rules and falls for the daughter of the US Secretary of Treasury, and Jeremy is left at the mercy of her "stage-five-clinger" sister. Being there for his buddy, Jeremy follows John to the familys huge estate for a weekend that may even be too wild for these professional party guys.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A has-been scientist, Dr Rick Marshall, gets more than he bargained for when his expedition takes a wrong turn into the Land of the Lost. Now, Marshall, his crack-smart research assistant, Holly, and a redneck survivalist named Will have no weapons, few skills and questionable smarts to survive in a world full of marauding dinosaurs, fantastic creatures and laugh-out-loud comedy.

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Owen Wilson stars in this riotous comedy from the producers of The 40-Year-Old Virgin and the writers of Superbad. When three young students, Ryan (Troy Gentile), Wade (Nate Hartley) and Emmit (David Dorfman) attend their first day at high school they come across school bully, Filkins (Alex Frost) who channels Hannibal Lecter. Coming up with the idea of getting some protection from this maniac, they place an ad in Soldier of Fortune magazine looking for a bodyguard. Enter Drillbit Taylor (Wilson), not the best but definitely the cheapest of the mercenaries, hit men and bodyguards who respond. Drillbit is steely, dangerous and skilled in covert black-ops and exotic martial arts; hes also a complete fraud. Taylor enrols them in physical and mental training, steeling them, and possibly himself, for the ultimate clash against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Five former basketball teammates, after 30 years since graduating high school, gather at the lake house where they celebrated their biggest victory to mourn the passing of their late coach. Over the course of the Fourth of July weekend, the five friends realise that just because theyve all grown up and started families doesnt mean that theyve lost that old spark. Adulthood is what you make of it, and no one at the lake house is eager to be the grown up of the gang.

programme.title: Starsky and Hutch
programme.desc: One of televisions most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken Hutch Hutchinson as theyre paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his stepfather, Frank Powell, whos a real jerk. Frank picks on Rod, tosses him around like a rag doll in their weekly sparring sessions, and definitely doesnt respect him, much less his stunts - as he says, "you never sneak up on a man whos been in a chemical fire". But when Frank falls ill, its up to Rod to stage the stunt jump of his life in order to raise the money for Franks heart operation and save him.

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: The accidental secret agent returns, sent on a mission to stop a group of international assassins before they eliminate a Chinese leader and cause global chaos.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is a London museum guard sent to Los Angeles in charge of a priceless painting. Mayhem erupts when the famously eccentric simpleton is mistaken for an art expert.

programme.title: Kicking and Screaming
programme.desc: Phil Weston is a mild-mannered suburban dad - whos suddenly transformed into a caffeine-fuelled sports maniac when he becomes the coach of his sons unruly soccer team. But when the championship pits Phils underdog team against the squad coached by his own domineering dad, its game on for the most uproarious mismatch of the season.

programme.title: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
programme.desc: Theyve graduated and theyre loose on the streets! Somehow, the members of this oddball squad of eccentrics have earned their badges. Now on their first assignment, they must use all the wits in their relatively limited capacity to tackle hoodlums and a local gang. But they must also overcome the rogue officers within their own precinct who are trying to thwart their bumbling efforts.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investors adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his stepfather, Frank Powell, whos a real jerk. programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: He knows no fear. He knows no danger. He knows nothing! When the priceless Crown Jewels are stolen, bumbling Johnny English is the only secret agent in the country who can solve the crime. His prime suspects: a sinister businessman and a beautiful woman with a mysterious interest in Johnnys top-secret mission. Can the clueless super spy save the day without denting the nations pride, or his super-cool Aston Martin spy car?

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Clear the runway for Derek Zoolander, VH1s three-time male model of the year but his face falls when hippie-chic hes so hot right now Hansel scooters in to steal this years award. The evil fashion guru Mugatu seizes the opportunity to turn Derek into a killing machine. Its a well-designed conspiracy and only with the help of Hansel and a few well-chosen accessories can Derek make the world safe.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Hes the best there is. In fact, hes the only one there is! Hes Ace Ventura Pet Detective and hes on the case to find the Miami Dolphins missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eyeball to eyeball with a man-eating shark, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. Whether hes undercover, under fire or underwater, he always gets his man or beast.

programme.title: Wanderlust
programme.desc: After George is downsized from his financial firm and Lindas depressing documentary is cancelled, they can no longer afford their overpriced micro-loft in New York. They find themselves with just one option - to pack up their lives and head south to move in with Georges brother and his wife. George and Linda stumble upon Elysium, an idyllic community where the only rule is to be yourself.

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: Doug Harris is a loveable but socially awkward groom-to-be with a problem: he has no best man. With less than two weeks to go until he marries the girl of his dreams, Doug is referred to Jimmy Callahan, owner and CEO of Best Man, Inc., a company that provides flattering best men for socially challenged guys in need. What ensues is a hilarious wedding charade as they try to pull off the big con, and an unexpected budding bromance between Doug and his fake best man Jimmy.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A private party in a hotel accommodating hundreds of cruise passengers leaves a young woman dead, the CSI team must work fast, before the killer escapes on one of the many cruise ships leaving the harbour.

programme.title: Ghosthunter
programme.desc: When documentary filmmaker Ben Lawrence investigates a newspaper article about a local security guard and part-time ghost hunter Jason King, he begins a seven-year journey into a world of haunted homes and broken souls and discovers a story about a man confronting his innermost demons. Soon after they meet, Ben offers to help Jason in his decades long search for the only person who may hold the key to Jasons lost childhood - his father. Part true-crime, part family mystery, GHOSTHUNTER is a real-life ghost story of one man unearthing his past to reclaim his future.

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Adapted from the Tony Award-winning play of the same name, this film is based on a true story of negotiations between implacable enemies that led to the 1993 Oslo Peace Accords.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster children. Inspired by a true story, discover this must-see family comedy from the creators of Daddys Home.

programme.title: Last Night In Soho
programme.desc: Edgar Wrights psychological thriller follows a young woman mysteriously able to enter the glamorous 1960s, where the dreams of the past splinter into something darker.

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: This film follows Swoff from a sobering stint in boot camp to active duty, where he sports a sniper rifle through Middle East deserts that provide no cover from the heat or Iraqi soldiers. Swoff and his fellow Marines sustain themselves with sardonic humanity and wicked comedy on blazing desert fields in a country they dont understand against an enemy they cant see for a cause they dont fully grasp.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: World War II veteran Artie Crawford lives in Northern Ireland. After his wifes death, he decides to set off alone to France to attend the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings.

programme.title: Rocketman
programme.desc: An epic musical story about Elton Johns breakthrough years. The film follows the fantastical journey of transformation from shy piano prodigy Reginald Dwight into international superstar Elton John. This inspirational movie tells the universally relatable story of how a small-town boy became one of the most iconic figures in pop culture.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: On an autumn night in 2003, Harvard undergrad and computer programming genius Mark Zuckerberg sits down at his computer and heatedly begins working on a new idea. In a fury of blogging and programming, what begins in his dorm room soon becomes a global social network and a revolution in communication. A mere six years and 500 million friends later, Mark Zuckerberg is the youngest billionaire in history, but for this entrepreneur, success leads to both personal and legal complications.

programme.desc: World War II veteran Artie Crawford lives in Northern Ireland. After his wifes death, he decides to set off alone to France to attend the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings.

programme.title: Rocketman
programme.desc: An epic musical story about Elton Johns breakthrough years. The film follows the fantastical journey of transformation from shy piano prodigy Reginald Dwight into international superstar Elton John. This inspirational movie tells the universally relatable story of how a small-town boy became one of the most iconic figures in pop culture.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: On an autumn night in 2003, Harvard undergrad and computer programming genius Mark Zuckerberg sits down at his computer and heatedly begins working on a new idea. In a fury of blogging and programming, what begins in his dorm room soon becomes a global social network and a revolution in communication. A mere six years and 500 million friends later, Mark Zuckerberg is the youngest billionaire in history, but for this entrepreneur, success leads to both personal and legal complications.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Its Halloween, 1991. Near Gloucester, Massachusetts, the six members of the Andrea Gail, a swordfishing boat, head out to sea for their last trip of the season. Unbeknownst to them, a shockingly brutal storm is slowly gaining steam. Before the National Weather Bureau has a chance to inform the crew of the impending danger, its too late. The resulting battle with three merging weather fronts, an unheralded natural disaster, is gruelling and tragic. Based on the true-life bestselling novel by Sebastian Junger.

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A bank robber falls in love with a former robbery hostage and decides he wants out of the life. With the Feds closing in he must choose: betray his friends or lose the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the governments intelligence community will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs - even the agents involved. Aaron Cross must use his genetically-engineered skills to survive the ultimate game of cat-and-mouse and finish what Jason Bourne started.

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: An elite DEA task force takes on the worlds deadliest drug cartels. When the team successfully executes a high-stakes raid on a cartel safe house, they think their work is done - until, one-by-one, the team members mysteriously start to be eliminated. As the body count rises, everyone is a suspect.

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A murderer is loose on the streets of Manhattan. A diabolical killer whose brutal slayings leave a trail of cryptic messages hidden at the scene of the crime. Clues which only a brilliant mind can interpret. Lincoln Rhyme is a gifted but disabled detective who is assigned to the case as the city becomes gripped with fear. Amelia Donaghy is a feisty, street-smart policewoman, who together with Lincoln, must go inside the mind of this terrifying madman and defeat him at his own game.

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: Meet Jack Foley, the most successful bank robber in the country. On the day he busts out of jail, he finds himself stealing something far more precious than money Karen Siscos heart. programme.title: Ned Kelly
programme.desc: You can kill a man but not a legend. Ned Kelly and his brother Dan, sons of an Irish pig thief exiled to the Australian penal colony in 1843, formed the core of the Kelly Gang (with two other men), an outlaw gang that roamed across Australia for over two wild years. Kelly was a clever bandit, making his own homemade armour, including steel chest plates and helmets, to stop bullets from stopping him. Kelly was first arrested at 16 for horse stealing, but he became an outlaw when he killed a police officer who was harassing his brother.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Bernard Jordan, a World War II veteran, sneaks out of his care home to attend the 70th anniversary commemoration of the D-Day landings in Normandy.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Just released from prison, all Rudy Duncan wants is to start a new life with Ashley, the girl of his dreams, whom he met through pen pal letters in prison. But between them and happiness stands her crazy brother, Gabriel, and his motley crew of deadly criminals who think Rudy has some inside information about a casino where he once had a job, a casino Gabriel and his short-fused posse plan to take down. Now, just as Rudy is beginning his new life, hes caught in a high-velocity avalanche of temptations and surprises that could bury him, unless he can artfully dodge them.

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Adapted from the Tony Award-winning play of the same name, this film is based on a true story of negotiations between implacable enemies that led to the 1993 Oslo Peace Accords.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster children. Inspired by a true story, discover this must-see family comedy from the creators of Daddys Home.

programme.title: Last Night In Soho
programme.desc: Edgar Wrights psychological thriller follows a young woman mysteriously able to enter the glamorous 1960s, where the dreams of the past splinter into something darker.

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: This film follows Swoff from a sobering stint in boot camp to active duty, where he sports a sniper rifle through Middle East deserts that provide no cover from the heat or Iraqi soldiers. programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After Hiccup is shot down on a remote island while searching for Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, he questions Dagurs intentions to rescue him.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When a dangerous subterranean Cavern Crasher dragon invades the Fireworm Queens underground nest, she approaches the Riders on Dragons Edge for help.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Fishlegs discovers a hidden civilisation of Albino Night Terrors beneath Dragons Edge, he must craft an escape plan after they attack the Riders.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island, battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Astrid comes down with the Odins Revenge flu and the Riders must search for the cure by finding a nearly extinct Buffalord dragon before Viggo does.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: The Riders head to a tropical island for fun in the sun, not realising its infested with Grimora leeches, which drives their dragons to turn on them.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.sub-title: To Heather Or Not To Heather

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby wont stop crying.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.sub-title: Between A Rock And A Hard Place
programme.desc: When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Dagur comes to Dragons Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of dragon riding.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When the Riders uncover the location of Viggos Dragon Auction, they must stop him from selling dragons and stealing all the gold in Berk.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: The Defenders of the Wing are a local island tribe who worship dragons and believe the Riders have stolen their protector - the Eruptodon dragon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.sub-title: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business

programme.desc: The team uncover the person behind the Incineration Day theft: General Dudley. While tracking him down, they are led into an ambush in the Swiss Alps. Is the general just a pawn in a larger plan?
