programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Get ready for an exhilarating ride of a lifetime! Join Tulio and Miguel and their hilarious horse Altivo as they set sail, map in hand, in search of golden treasure in the all-star adventure, The Road to El Dorado! Upon landing on the shores of El Dorado, the legendary Lost City of Gold, Tulio and Miguel are mistaken for gods and are lavished with riches beyond their wildest dreams! As friendship, loyalty, and greed collide, our unlikely heroes must make the decision of their lives: run off with the gold or face unforeseen dangers to save the people of El Dorado.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: An ogre, with the help of an annoying donkey, tries to win back his swamp by returning a princess to a scheming lord.

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Youll never look at warm apple pie the same way again. This film takes a hysterical look at the goal of four unlucky in love high school friends who make the ultimate pact: lose their virginity by prom night. As they try to manipulate their way into the hearts of some of their classmates, their plans often backfire with hilarity. Follow the raging hormones of four teenage boys and their girls as they gear up for the most important night of their lives: the prom.

As the victims begin to pile up and the laughs pile on, none of your favourite scary movies escape the razor-sharp satire of this outrageously funny parody.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office. But Satan sends his youngest and nicest son, Little Nicky, to bring his two treacherous brothers home.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Male nurse Greg Focker is poised to propose to his girlfriend Pam during a weekend stay at her parents home. But heres the catch he needs to ask her father first. Alas, the fur flies as Jack Byrnes, Pams cat-crazy, ex-CIA father takes an immediate dislike to her less-than-truthful beau. Gregs quest for approval gets seriously side-tracked as Murphys Law takes over and a hilarious string of mishaps turns him into a master of disaster and total pariah in the eyes of the entire family, all except for his shell-shocked girlfriend, who cant believe she still lovers her one-man wrecking crew.

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Clear the runway for Derek Zoolander, VH1s three-time male model of the year but his face falls when hippie-chic hes so hot right now Hansel scooters in to steal this years award. The evil fashion guru Mugatu seizes the opportunity to turn Derek into a killing machine. Its a well-designed conspiracy and only with the help of Hansel and a few well-chosen accessories can Derek make the world safe.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: A harrowing war drama where two Black Hawk helicopters are shot down over Mogadishu, trapping an elite team of American soldiers in a 15-hour firefight as they try to recover their fallen comrades.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: For four years, the courageous crew of the NSEA Protector set off on thrilling and often dangerous missions in space - and then their series was cancelled. Now, 20 years later, aliens under attack mistake the Galaxy Quest television transmissions for historical documents and beam up the crew of has-been actors to save the universe. With no script, no director and no clue, the actors must turn in the performances of their lives.

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: George Jung is the son of Fred, a struggling small business owner. Seeing his family struggle to make ends meet and failing, George vows never to share a similar fate. Moving to California with his friend, Tuna, he finds success by selling marijuana in the 1960s, but ends up in prison for it. He then becomes extremely rich by working with Pablo Escabar by importing cocaine into America, but trouble escalates when the FBI are in pursuit.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Desperate to find their missing son, Paul and his wife Amanda trick eminent palaeontologist Dr Alan Grant into accompanying them to Isla Sorna. The small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: In this send-up of todays most popular horror movies, a familiar-looking group of teenagers find themselves being stalked by a more-than-vaguely recognisable masked killer. As the victims begin to pile up and the laughs pile on, none of your favourite scary movies escape the razor-sharp satire of this outrageously funny parody.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Sonny Koufax is a carefree slob trying to save his love life by becoming responsible. He gets the chance when a cute kid turns up needing a father.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Get ready for an exhilarating ride of a lifetime! Join Tulio and Miguel and their hilarious horse Altivo as they set sail, map in hand, in search of golden treasure in the all-star adventure, The Road to El Dorado! Upon landing on the shores of El Dorado, the legendary Lost City of Gold, Tulio and Miguel are mistaken for gods and are lavished with riches beyond their wildest dreams! As friendship, loyalty, and greed collide, our unlikely heroes must make the decision of their lives: run off with the gold or face unforeseen dangers to save the people of El Dorado.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: An ogre, with the help of an annoying donkey, tries to win back his swamp by returning a princess to a scheming lord.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: For four years, the courageous crew of the NSEA Protector set off on thrilling and often dangerous missions in space - and then their series was cancelled. Now, 20 years later, aliens under attack mistake the Galaxy Quest television transmissions for historical documents and beam up the crew of has-been actors to save the universe. With no script, no director and no clue, the actors must turn in the performances of their lives.

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Youll never look at warm apple pie the same way again. This film takes a hysterical look at the goal of four unlucky in love high school friends who make the ultimate pact: lose their virginity by prom night. As they try to manipulate their way into the hearts of some of their classmates, their plans often backfire with hilarity. Follow the raging hormones of four teenage boys and their girls as they gear up for the most important night of their lives: the prom.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner has anger management issues. His quiet life as a brilliant research scientist working with ex-girlfriend Betty Ross conceals a painful past. A freak lab accident reveals Bruces heroic impulses but also unleashes his inner demons. And he becomes the most powerful being on the face of the Earth: a superhero and a monster.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: From Waynes basement, Wayne and Garth broadcast a talk-show called "Waynes World" on local public access television. The show comes to the attention of a sleazy network executive who wants to produce a big-budget version of "Waynes World"-and he also wants Waynes girlfriend, a rock singer named Cassandra. Wayne and Garth have to battle the executive not only to save their show, but also Cassandra.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Desperate to find their missing son, Paul and his wife Amanda trick eminent palaeontologist Dr Alan Grant into accompanying them to Isla Sorna. The small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Detroit cop Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills, this time to track down bad guys at an amusement park. Judge Reinhold and Bronson Pinchot are also back for this third instalment.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: World War II veteran Artie Crawford lives in Northern Ireland. After his wifes death, he decides to set off alone to France to attend the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Half-human, half-Atlantean Arthur Curry goes on a journey that will not only force him to face who he really is, but to discover if he is worthy of who he was born to be, a king.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent suddenly discovers his scruples and promptly loses his job. But with the help of one loyal colleague and one outrageous client, he learns that loving well is the best revenge.

programme.title: Last Night In Soho
programme.desc: Edgar Wrights psychological thriller follows a young woman mysteriously able to enter the glamorous 1960s, where the dreams of the past splinter into something darker.

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: After a voice tells a farmer to put a baseball diamond in his cornfield, the ghosts of famous players begin to appear on it.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: World War II veteran Artie Crawford lives in Northern Ireland. After his wifes death, he decides to set off alone to France to attend the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Earth is covered with water and the human race struggles to survive on dilapidated boats and makeshift floating cities. A drifter becomes caught up in the struggle between the evil Deacon and a childs secret key to a wondrous place called "Dryland."

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: The worlds favourite Bad Boys are back with their iconic mix of edge-of-your seat action and outrageous comedy, but this time with a twist: Miamis finest are now on the run.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Set in ancient China, a mercenary travels east in search of gunpowder and discovers the mighty Great Wall and the terrible secret behind why it was built.

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A bank robber falls in love with a former robbery hostage and decides he wants out of the life. With the Feds closing in he must choose: betray his friends or lose the woman he loves.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: Based on the character created by bestselling author Tom Clancy, Jack Ryan is a global action thriller set in the present day. This original story follows a young Jack as he uncovers a financial terrorist plot. The story follows him from 9/11, through his tour of duty in Afghanistan, which scarred him forever, and into his early days in the Financial Intelligence Unit of the modern CIA where he becomes an analyst, under the guardianship of his handler, Harper. When Ryan believes hes uncovered a Russian plot to collapse the United States economy, he goes from being an analyst to becoming a spy and must fight to save his own life and those of countless others, while also trying to protect the thing thats more important to him than anything, his relationship with his fiancee Cathy.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Marty McFly, a typical American teenager of the 1980s, is accidentally sent back to 1955 in a plutonium-powered DeLorean time machine, invented by a slightly mad scientist. During his often hysterical but amazing trip back in time, Marty must make certain his teenage parents-to-be meet and fall in love so that he can get back to the future.

programme.title: Back To The Future II
programme.desc: Marty McFly returns, this time travelling forward to 2015 with wacky Doc Brown to save his kids. Their crazy time-travels have a mind-bending effect on history.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Young Alan Parrish sits down as a young boy to play a game with his friend, Sarah, and on a roll of the dice is mysteriously transported into the strange jungle realm of Jumanji. There he remains trapped for 26 years, until two newly orphaned children, Judy and Peter, playing in the attic of Alans childhood home, free the now-adult Alan from the games clutches. But to defeat Jumanjis encroaching powers, the three reluctant players must find the now-grown Sarah and band together as a makeshift family to finish the game - before it finishes them.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA analyst Jack Ryan travels to London with his wife and child. Upon being caught in the middle of a terrorist attack on a member of the royal family, Ryan helps to thwart the assailants. Ryans courageous act, however, marks him and his family as a target for revenge in the sights of the terrorist whose brother Ryan killed.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been eight years since Batman vanished into the night, turning, in that instant, from hero to fugitive. Assuming the blame for the death of DA Harvey Dent, the Dark Knight sacrificed everything for what he and Commissioner Gordon both hoped was the greater good. For a time the lie worked, as criminal activity in Gotham City was crushed under the weight of the anti-crime Dent Act. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar with a mysterious agenda. Far more dangerous, however, is the emergence of Bane, a masked terrorist whose ruthless plans for Gotham drive Bruce out of his self-imposed exile. Even if he dons the cape and cowl again, Batman may be no match for Bane.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss The Lorax is an adaptation of Dr. Seuss classic tale of a forest creature who shares the enduring power of hope. In the walled city of Thneed-Ville, where everything is artificial and even the air is a commodity, a boy named Ted hopes to win the heart of his dream girl, Audrey. When he learns of her wish to see a real tree, Ted seeks out the Once-ler, a ruined old businessman outside of town in a stark wasteland. Upon hearing of how the hermit gave into his greed for profits and devastated the land over the protests of the Lorax, Ted is inspired to undo the disaster. However, the greedy Mayor of Thneed-Ville, Aloysius OHare, has made his fortune exploiting the environmental collapse and is determined to stop the boy from undermining his business.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Marty McFly, a typical American teenager of the 1980s, is accidentally sent back to 1955 in a plutonium-powered DeLorean time machine, invented by a slightly mad scientist. During his often hysterical but amazing trip back in time, Marty must make certain his teenage parents-to-be meet and fall in love so that he can get back to the future.

programme.title: Back To The Future II

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: The true meaning of family gets tested like never before as Dom Toretto takes the team on a worldwide ride with high-stakes action, old friends and a surprising new foe.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: When he is ruled to be property and not a person, a foul-mouthed teddy bear seeks the aid of a legendary civil rights attorney to gain the justice he deserves.

programme.title: Bad Boys For Life
programme.desc: The original Bad Boys are back! After a string of assassinations and an attempt on Mikes life, he convinces a hesitant Marcus to hold off retirement and partner one last time.

programme.desc: Horatio finally closes the case of his brothers murder.

programme.title: Planetshakers
programme.desc: Join Planetshakers for their church service in Melbourne. A fresh Word with praise and worship each week. Live empowered.

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in Gods Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry. Hear inspiration for change, healing, peace and joy through his affective communication connecting you to God, the church, and the world!

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the worlds leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of Gods Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting Gods truth in clear and practical applications.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA; join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church, for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!

programme.title: Takeaways with Kirk Cameron
programme.desc: Join Kirk Cameron to discuss pressing issues facing the world today with compassionate, well-informed guests, and together, find actionable takeaways that we can use today, this week, and this month to bring more of Heaven to Earth.

programme.title: A Cathedral Pilgrimage
programme.desc: Dominating the landscape for centuries, ancient cathedrals and abbeys reflect Britains turbulent history through their architectural grandeur. A Pilgrimage through Britains Great Cathedrals explores cathedrals and abbeys found throughout England and Wales, featuring interviews with historians and experts and breathtaking footage of the cathedrals legendary facades and soaring interior spaces.

programme.title: Jesus the Game Changer
programme.desc: A 10 part documentary series on how the life and teaching of Jesus changed the world and why it matters. Karl Faase travels to the USA, UK, Australia, Singapore and India interviewing over 30 authors, speakers and modern day game changers. Guests include, Eric Metaxas, Christine Caine, John Ortberg, Rodney Stark, Rico Tice and Mary Jo Sharp.

programme.title: Veggie Tales
programme.desc: In every VeggieTales video, Larry the Cucumber sings one of his special "Silly Songs with Larry". This video contains many of the most popular Silly Songs, hosted by The Pirates Who Dont Do Anything (who debut a Silly Song of their own).

programme.title: Night Owls and Early Birds
programme.desc: Night Owls and Early Birds is a new topical Bible study show from the creators of Owlegories. Join Hoot, Savannah, Screech, Charlie, and Steve as they take a deeper dive into the truths found in Gods Word.

programme.title: Arise Kids TV
programme.desc: Join the ARISE Kids TV team in our brand-new series - Limitless! We believe that Gods desire for our lives is that we would love limitless, limitless God, Limitless life! This week we learn our new memory verse, we meet our new characters Cody and Brody, Harry and Jonny have some connect four fun, Nicole brings the word and so much more!

programme.title: Life with Paul De Jong
programme.desc: We like to call it soul food. LIFE TV uses creative illustration, real life stories and biblical teaching to encourage and help viewers discover a greater purpose to their lives.

programme.title: Drive Thru History: The Gospels
programme.desc: Dave Stotts takes us on his most exciting adventure yet as he tells the story of Jesus from the locations recorded in the Gospels of Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John. Dave travels to over 50 ancient sites in Israel to deliver the Gospels in a fresh and compelling way. As Dave uncovers the evidence for the truth of scripture, he encourages all of us to get excited about reading the Bible again!

programme.title: A Thousand Tomorrows
programme.desc: Cody and Ali grow closer and their feeling grow stronger, but will Alis secret and Codys inability to forgive end their relationship?

programme.title: Always Good News
programme.desc: All around the world the power of the Gospel is shared by ordinary people facing extraordinary obstacles. Believers in every part of the world face unique challenges. Travel around the globe to Estonia, Colombia and Taiwan with Franklin Graham as they witness the impact and change in lives as the host the Festival of Hope.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: Why Haven_t My Prayers Been Answered? Part 2
programme.desc: God hears and answers prayer. But whats in our hearts can help or hinder the effectiveness of those prayers. In part two of Why Havent My Prayers Been Answered?, Pastor Bayless delves deeper into this pressing question, warning against barriers that hinder prayer such as focusing on sin, unresolved anger, and wavering faith. He also shares real-life, encouraging stories of breakthroughs in prayer that came when people embraced forgiveness toward others. Listen and learn how to experience the transformative power of prayer by walking in alignment with Gods purpose!

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Protected By The Blood Of Jesus Pt 1 of 3
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: The best-known Christian evangelist of the 20th century, Billy Graham gained world attention in 1949 with a tent revival in downtown Los Angeles that was scheduled for three weeks and lasted six. In the ensuing 55 years and more, Billy Graham Crusades consistently drew audiences of thousands to arenas and stadiums throughout the world.Classic Crusades presents the best of the last 35 years of Billy Graham that brought the message of salvation through Jesus Christ to the world. World renowned actors, singers, athletes and ministers share the platform with Dr. Graham. Also often features the famous sounds of the Billy Graham Choir, George Beverly Shea and Cliff Barrows for an hour of blessing and inspiration to all who watch.

programme.title: Impact for Life
programme.desc: An inspirational program with principles for living, and life stories from everyday New Zealanders. Collated with a fresh and dynamic edge, Pastors Peter and Bev Mortlock share principles both from the platform, and on location. Impact for Life equips people to mature and grow into Christ-likeness while maximising their potential.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the worlds leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.

programme.title: Greater
programme.desc: Moving and impacting short films depicting four incredible life stories that illustrate how God has empowered individuals to overcome self-harm, anxiety, addiction, depression, or suicide. The series also includes in-depth discussion by a panel of leaders from the Christian emotional, mental, and spiritual sector. This mini series explores the variety of ways that Jesus leads people into freedom; from instant life changing God encounters, to the piece-by-piece transformation that takes places over years. Uncover practical steps towards inner health and freedom and the vital role that Jesus has in making that all possible.

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: Glorious Gospel Church has been meeting the needs of the community since 1990. With a vision for a church that is REAL, RELATABLE, ENJOYABLE, LIFE-CHANGING and UPLIFTING, they are committed to providing church services that will enable you to experience church this way. Linked by mutual vision and values, which are based firmly in the Bible and what the Bible teaches, GGCs mandate is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ in a relatable and practical way.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of Gods Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting Gods truth in clear and practical applications.

programme.title: The Catholic Guy
programme.desc: Bruce Downes is The Catholic Guy. Bruce and his team will move, inspire and challenge you to live your life to the absolute fullest. No matter your age, situation or background, be prepared to laugh, learn and listen to what God is trying to say to you. Bruce travels Australia speaking regularly about his experiences in life and in the Church in a way that is both relatable and easy to understand. Bruces message of power, impact, freedom and purpose is for anyone and everyone - for no matter where you are around the world today, God is never far from you.

programme.title: The Way of the Master
programme.desc: Reincarnation is a popular belief, but what does the bible say?

programme.title: Friends and Heroes
programme.desc: Friends and Heroes is an animated childrens adventure based in Ancient Egypt, Israel and Rome. The story follows two young friends Macky and Portia as they fight for justice against the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Hillsong Kids: Cubbyhouse
programme.desc: An entertaining show for the little ones aged between 2 and 6, with songs, fun craft time, bible stories and animated teaching and illustrations.

programme.title: God Rocks! Playlist
programme.desc: Join kid-hosts Myles and Stella for a fun, non-stop musical playlist of hit songs about Faith and Trust! Bible-based songs and scripture songs make up this God Rocks Playlist, an MTV style music program targeting kids 5-12. The series features high quality, original songs from the award-winning God Rocks! band as well as other musical characters from the God Rocks universe.

programme.title: Hunter and Twerp Scripture Seekers
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderful world of Brightington, home of Hunter and Twerp, Scripture Seekers! Stacks of fun Bible lessons for children to enjoy. Every episode brings new challenges to overcome and new lessons to learn, such as why do we pray? What/who is the Holy Spirit? Why is the Bible important? How can we recognise the voice of God and avoid nonsense teaching? Challenging and powerful lessons are introduced in the context of wacky comedy adventures that children will love so much, they wont even realise theyre learning!

programme.title: Whirl
programme.desc: Whirl is a Bible-based cartoon series about the loveable, sometimes overly-enthusiastic kids of First Second Church. In each episode, the kids tackle a different theme that is central to Christian values. Everything from generosity and forgiveness to doubt and the trinity are explored over the course of the series. And while the issues dealt with in each episode are relatable, the solutions this kooky cast often find are a bit unconventional. Whether the kids of First Second Church are searching for a hidden sanctum of the churchs altar guild, or trying to outsmart robots bent on world domination, these characters will keep the whole family laughing and learning.

programme.title: Deditos
programme.desc: This quirky kids show introduces children to classic stories from the Old Testament using finger puppets.

programme.title: The Blello Show
programme.desc: Join Kyle, Lyds, Extra Bear, and Stu as they share with you some cool vids, catchy catch phrases crazy challenges, things you can do in 3 minutes, and other random stuff to make your life awesome. Its the Blello Show! Lets go!

programme.title: Arise Kids TV
programme.desc: Join the ARISE Kids TV team in our brand-new series - Limitless! We believe that Gods desire for our lives is that we would love limitless, limitless God, Limitless life! This week we learn our new memory verse, we meet our new characters Cody and Brody, Harry and Jonny have some connect four fun, Nicole brings the word and so much more!

programme.title: Ryan Defrates: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Ryan Defrates: Secret Agent is an animated action-adventure series about a young spy with a whole lot to learn! Hes arrogant and reckless and always insists on working alone. That is, until the day hes paired with a very unlikely partner his mum! Deb Defrates is not a spy. She knows more about shopping than solving crime, but her wisdom and kindness somehow always seem to save the day.

programme.title: Kids Beach Club
programme.desc: Join the Beach Club Kids as they navigate life, explore character lessons, and have a blast playing memorable games while discovering God through the pages of His Word, the Bible.

programme.title: Soul Sessions
programme.desc: Hosted by Sara Jane Elika Soul Sessions is an exploration into the New Zealand gospel music scene with a focus on Pacific musicians and artists. The award-winning artists are a mix of new and established faces, who share the vision of expressing their faith through music.

programme.title: View and Chew
programme.desc: Miami meets Havana when Mike gets dinner and a show at an authentic Cuban restaurant; Mike gets the scoop on the coolest ice cream spot and hottest beaches Miami has to offer.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Freedom From The Spirit of Depression
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: The Kindness Diaries
programme.desc: Adventurer Leon Logothetis travels from Alaska to Argentina relying on the kindness of strangers and surprising unsuspecting good Samaritans with life-changing gifts!

programme.title: Be That
programme.desc: A traumatic event is an experience which is highly threatening to ourselves or the safety of others and can be either physical, emotional, mental, or relational in nature. Its normal to experience trauma symptoms immediately after an event and for up to 4 weeks, while the brain is processing it. When people suffer the effects of trauma for much longer, this is known as post traumatic stress disorder and this disruption interferes with an individuals ability to function normally. However, overcoming the effects of trauma and ptsd is possible through treatment which focuses on processing the trauma experiences into memories and restoring a sense of safety both cognitively and emotionally. With guest Ruth Whitford.

programme.title: Autumn Stables
programme.desc: Following the tragic loss of her husband, Autumn Carlisle is determined to honour his memory by selling their beloved horse ranch to someone who will cherish it as much as they did. When Jake Stevens, a charming and seemingly trustworthy buyer, expresses interest, Autumn believes she has found the perfect new owner. However, as she spends more time with Jake, she begins to see new possibilities for her future. As their bond deepens, Autumn realises that moving on doesnt mean forgetting the past - it means opening her heart to new beginnings. But when she discovers Jakes true intentions, she must decide whether to fight for the ranch or take a leap of faith in love once again.

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schullers grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherds Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA; join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church, for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!

programme.title: Give Me an Answer
programme.desc: Give Me an Answer exists to answer lifes most difficult questions. The shows are recorded on college campus across the United States where Cliffe Knechtle engages with skeptical students and professors, to give real answers to the tough questions about Christianity.

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
programme.desc: The POstables are back identifying the intended recipients of a trio of dead letters which have a surprising, personal impact on all of them. Stars Eric Mabius, Kristin Booth, Crystal Lowe, Geoff Gustafson, Rhiannon Fish.

programme.title: Centuries Collide
programme.sub-title: St. Valentine - The OG of Love
programme.desc: There are so many legends surrounding the life of St. Valentine that he almost borders on the mythological. In this episode we travel to Rome to discover why we celebrate his day every year and why his legend has survived nearly 2000 years!

programme.title: Welcome to Hope
programme.desc: John reclaims his life and welcomes a new beginning, while Jake leans on friends and family to help with May.

programme.title: Smoketown
programme.sub-title: I Can_t Prove It, But I Know
programme.desc: In the wake of a mysterious and shocking murder, three unique people - an Assistant Chief of Police, a reporter, and a teenage girl - are supernaturally empowered to fight for the citys poorest and most racially diverse neighbourhood.

programme.title: Life with Paul De Jong
programme.desc: We like to call it soul food. LIFE TV uses creative illustration, real life stories and biblical teaching to encourage and help viewers discover a greater purpose to their lives.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of Gods Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting Gods truth in clear and practical applications.

programme.title: Planetshakers
programme.desc: Join Planetshakers for their church service in Melbourne. A fresh Word with praise and worship each week. Live empowered.

programme.title: A Very Tall Man
programme.desc: Gary Hoogvliet, a very tall man, interviews interesting folk, not quite as tall as he, but nevertheless with fascinating and inspiring stories to tell.

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: The best-known Christian evangelist of the 20th century, Billy Graham gained world attention in 1949 with a tent revival in downtown Los Angeles that was scheduled for three weeks and lasted six. In the ensuing 55 years and more, Billy Graham Crusades consistently drew audiences of thousands to arenas and stadiums throughout the world.Classic Crusades presents the best of the last 35 years of Billy Graham that brought the message of salvation through Jesus Christ to the world. World renowned actors, singers, athletes and ministers share the platform with Dr. Graham. Also often features the famous sounds of the Billy Graham Choir, George Beverly Shea and Cliff Barrows for an hour of blessing and inspiration to all who watch.

programme.title: Power for Living
programme.desc: Powerful words from Evangelist and Pastor Bill Newman.

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: Glorious Gospel Church has been meeting the needs of the community since 1990. With a vision for a church that is REAL, RELATABLE, ENJOYABLE, LIFE-CHANGING and UPLIFTING, they are committed to providing church services that will enable you to experience church this way. Linked by mutual vision and values, which are based firmly in the Bible and what the Bible teaches, GGCs mandate is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ in a relatable and practical way.

programme.title: Impact for Life
programme.desc: An inspirational program with principles for living, and life stories from everyday New Zealanders. Collated with a fresh and dynamic edge, Pastors Peter and Bev Mortlock share principles both from the platform, and on location. Impact for Life equips people to mature and grow into Christ-likeness while maximising their potential.

programme.title: Life with Paul De Jong
programme.desc: We like to call it soul food. LIFE TV uses creative illustration, real life stories and biblical teaching to encourage and help viewers discover a greater purpose to their lives.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of Gods Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting Gods truth in clear and practical applications.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: Help For Our Healing/A Life of Love
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: They Had Been with Jesus (Harrison Conley)
programme.desc: It is impossible to have a true encounter with Christ and go away unchanged. It happened to the disciples, and it still happens today. In his powerful message They Had Been with Jesus, Pastor Harrison Conley reflects on the apostle Peters remarkable transformation and reveals how genuine encounters with Christ transform believers into Holy Spirit-empowered witnesses. Youll be challenged to embrace boldness and holiness, and youll be encouraged to stand firm in your faith, letting your life declare, without question, that you have been with Jesus. Listen now and rediscover your role as a courageous pillar of truth because of your encounter with Jesus!

programme.title: Elevation Experience
programme.desc: The Elevation Experience with Pastor Steven Furtick features inspirational and challenging messages from Pastor Steven as well as original worship music from Elevation Church in Charlotte, North Carolina.

programme.title: PowerPoint with Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA; join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church, for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Freedom From The Spirit of Depression
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: Katherine Ruonala Ministries
programme.desc: Katherine Ruonala shares a practical message of love and hope to the nations. Reaching across denominational walls, her ministry is used to spread the fires of revival and ignite a fresh passion in the hearts of believers to go deeper in their relationship with God. Katherine carries a strong prophetic and miracle anointing with many experiencing instant healing in her meetings.

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in Gods Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry. Hear inspiration for change, healing, peace and joy through his affective communication connecting you to God, the church, and the world!

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the worlds leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.

programme.title: Nothing is Impossible
programme.desc: Scott Becks life has not gone to plan. Working as the janitor at the high school where he was once the star of the basketball team, he is dealing with an ailing father, a busted truck and memories of Ryan, the girl he loved long ago. But opportunity arises when Ryan, now the owner of the Knoxville Silver Knights, decides to hold open tryouts for the team. Scott attempts to make the impossible happen by not only making the team, but getting back the woman he loves in this inspiring and winning drama.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off
programme.desc: In the grand finale, our final bakers face off in the ultimate baking showdown to crown Australias best amateur baker! First up they must create their Signature Fondant Fancies, then conquer Maggie Beers luscious Chocolate, Pear and Hazelnut Torte. For their final Showstopper of the season, they must bake their Dream Homes- and their only limit is their imagination. Theyll be judged by culinary icon Maggie Beer and esteemed chef Matt Moran, who will decide which of the three has earned the title of Australias Best Amateur Baker.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its dairy week, and Prue and Paul have set 3 tricky challenges to test the remaining bakers. There is a decorative signature that involves a tricky turn-out, a complex technical that dates back to Henry VIII, and last but by no means least an intricate showstopper that usually found at the centre of Indian weddings and celebrations. Which baker will impress Prue and Paul enough to keep their place in the tent and who will be heading home?

programme.title: Roux Down the River: The Thames
programme.desc: Michel Roux starts his journey at his familys 3 Star river side restaurant, indulges at Heston Blumenthals Michelin star pub and cooks up a classic potato truffade.

programme.title: Rick Steins Road To Mexico
programme.desc: Rick enjoys a hearty steak and eggs American diner special and bids a fond farewell to his trusty Ford Mustang as he heads across what is reputed to be the busiest border crossing in the world, San Diego to Tijuana, to begin his Mexican adventures. He follows the Pacific coastline down to Ensenada, sampling flour tortilla burritos and fresh fish landed, marinated and cooked on Popotla Beach, before visiting the Valle de Guadalupe - Mexicos best kept secret for fabulous wines and the jewel in its culinary crown for Baja Med cuisine.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Two chefs from the South West cook head to head for the judges. The chefs cook all their courses as the judges are joined by Team GB Olympic gold medallist Joe Choong.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Ultimate Cookery Course
programme.desc: Gordons cookery course continues as he shows how to cook more delicious food on a budget. Recipes include leek and gruyere rosti with fried eggs, a delicious apple crumble, and seriously impressive homemade gnocchi.

programme.title: Jamies Quick and Easy Food
programme.desc: With four mouth watering recipes in each show, this week Jamies cooking up his spicy aromatic Lamb Kofta Flatbreads a mighty meaty treat, for when you need good food fast. Next its his Spanish inspired Broad Bean and Manchego Cheese Salad packed full of goodness and put together in minutes. Followed by Gnarly Peanut Chicken with a clever shortcut for this super-charged satay. And for a deliciously sweet treat, Peach and Almond Alaska, a super-quick and totally irresistible pud. If you think you havent got time to cook think again.

programme.title: Mary Berrys Quick Cooking
programme.desc: In this episode Mary is given an access all areas pass as she heads behind the scenes at London Heathrow airport. Where everyone has one eye on the clock and a flight to catch, Mary wants to see how the restaurants and cafes feed the 70 million people that pass through the terminals each year in record breaking time. Mary throws herself into the different roles needed to keep one of the busiest airports in the world fed and running smoothly, including a stint as an airport Fire Fighter. In this episode Mary whips up some wonderful quick delights including a rich Chicken Korma, a delicious Apple Sandwich Cake and some extra special Roast Scallops.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less
programme.desc: Chris and Jordan try to help a family with triplets start cooking from scratch, waste less food and start saving money, as family memories are more important than ever.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its dairy week, and Prue and Paul have set 3 tricky challenges to test the remaining bakers. There is a decorative signature that involves a tricky turn-out, a complex technical that dates back to Henry VIII, and last but by no means least an intricate showstopper that usually found at the centre of Indian weddings and celebrations. Which baker will impress Prue and Paul enough to keep their place in the tent and who will be heading home?

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in Italy at an enormous pizza factory, where they produce 400,000 frozen pizzas each day. He watches as each one is stretched to exactly 26 centimetres in diameter, then pricked with 522 holes.

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul
programme.desc: Rick Stein continues his Byzantine odyssey through Croatia and savours the famous native oysters of Ston. In his own kitchen on the Greek island of Symi, Rick cooks traditional Albanian dishes like Lepur Comlek and Tave Kosi.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less
programme.desc: Chris and Jordan try to help a family with triplets start cooking from scratch, waste less food and start saving money, as family memories are more important than ever.

programme.title: MasterChef UK: The Professionals
programme.desc: MasterChef: The Professionals is back on BBC One for its 15th series, as 32 ambitious chefs from across the country battle to become the 2022 Champion. Presiding over the UKs most revered cooking competition, are new judge and acclaimed chef Anna Haugh, Michelin-starred chef Marcus Wareing and celebrated MasterChef judge, Gregg Wallace, all eager to discover a brand new culinary star. In tonights Quarter Final, the best four chefs from the weeks Heats return to face two more demanding challenges set by judges Anna and Marcus. First, they face their first Invention Test before cooking for some of the countrys top restaurant critics. Only the best chefs will win a place in the Semi Finals. In the first challenge, the judges ask the Quarter Finalists to make a dish based around the tried and tested combination of orange and ginger. As well as a wide variety of oranges and various ginger ingredients to choose from, the chefs have a selection of poultry, fish, vegetables, dried fruit, nuts and chocolate to use in their sweet or savoury dishes. With just 10 minutes to plan and an hour and 10 minutes to prepare and cook, who will be able to think quickly and deliver a sublime plate of food that stands out from the pack?

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals
programme.desc: The teams must create 24 chocolate figurines and desserts, then tackle the challenge of making 48 chocolate bars in the showpiece round.

programme.title: The Great Kiwi Bake Off
programme.desc: To start off the week, the bakers are asked to make 12 choux au craquelin, which must have a creamy dairy filling and a coloured craquelin.

programme.title: Food Safari Italy
programme.desc: Presenter Guy Grossi visits dedicated Melbourne artisan baker Daniel Chirico, tastes bread straight from the oven drizzled with olive oil, and learns why loaves with soul take a little longer to make. And to prove that nothing in the Italian realm goes to waste, Guy then demonstrates a delicious bread-based salad called panzanella. Maeve learns about the Italian passion for veal and meets passionate Western Australian butcher Vince Garreffa on the farm that raises his veal - White Rocks, south of Perth. Celebrated Sydney chef Nino Zoccali, from restaurant Pendolino, explains the joys of using secondary cuts of meat and shows how easy it is to make a beautiful osso buco, rich and full of flavour. Guy goes to the beautiful pine forests of Mount Macedon with chef Aron Michielli to forage for pine forest mushrooms and slippery jacks. Aron takes Guy to his Melbourne restaurant Biricchino to whip up magnificent pappardelle pasta with wild mushrooms.

programme.title: Food Safari Italy
programme.desc: This episode goes to the far western end of Australia to visit the crayfishermen of the stunning Abrolhos Islands off Geraldton. Maeve spends time with Justin Pirrottina to learn how his father and other Italian fishermen came to fish the area, and tastes how good a cray on the barbie can be. Guy pops in on Melbourne chef Maurizio Esposito to learn the secrets of his delicious crayfish gnocchi recipe. Maeve seeks out the best pizza and visits Melbourne pizzaiolo Alessandro DAuria of Pizze e Fichi, who has made thousands of pizzas in his years perfecting the art of pizza. Artichokes are loved throughout Italy and were brought to Australia by growers like the Faranda family in Werribee South on the flat plains outside Melbourne. Joe Faranda shows Guy what to look for to get the best, and Guy then makes delicious stuffed artichokes using a recipe passed on to him by his father. Italian gelato has colonised the worlds tastebuds, and Sicilian gelato-making brothers Ciccio and Salvatore La Rosa from Gelatomassi in Sydney explain why its so good.

programme.title: Outback Gourmet With Justine Schofield
programme.desc: Join Justine on her adventure around the Australian Outback. Justine travels from Darwin to Kakadu, while exploring the Ubirri Rock Art walk. She prepares a picnic lunch by the stunning Maguk Pools.

programme.title: Award Winning Tasmania

programme.title: Farm to Fork
programme.desc: Andy prepares flavourful roasted cabbage drizzled with vibrant green tahini. Michael showcases his culinary expertise by baking succulent salmon and prawn in paper, creating a mouthwatering dish.

programme.title: Farm to Fork
programme.desc: Andy delights with his rendition of dads fish and chips, a classic and beloved dish. Courtney showcases her whole roast pumpkin pie, accompanied by creamy vegan cashew cream and crispy roast seeds.

programme.desc: Michel Roux starts his journey at his familys 3 Star river side restaurant, indulges at Heston Blumenthals Michelin star pub and cooks up a classic potato truffade.

programme.title: James Martins Islands To Highlands

programme.title: Ainsleys Market Menu
programme.desc: Ainsleys next stop is the coastal town of Warrnambool in Victoria, where rolling green pastures meet the deep blue sea. That means beef, dairy and the freshest seafood, all at the Sunday market.

programme.title: Eva Longoria: Searching for Mexico
programme.desc: Celebrating Mexicos people, produce and past, Eva Longoria devours diverse and delicious dishes in a country where ancient meets modern.

programme.title: The Great Canadian Bake Off
programme.desc: The judges introduce Coffee and Tea Week to the Tent in homage to the flavours and traditions of this cross-cultural ritual.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Next Level Chef
programme.desc: The 10 remaining contestants step into the kitchen with the goal of elevating the traditional pizza into a next-level masterpiece.

programme.title: Food Safari Italy
programme.desc: Presenter Guy Grossi visits dedicated Melbourne artisan baker Daniel Chirico, tastes bread straight from the oven drizzled with olive oil, and learns why loaves with soul take a little longer to make. And to prove that nothing in the Italian realm goes to waste, Guy then demonstrates a delicious bread-based salad called panzanella. Maeve learns about the Italian passion for veal and meets passionate Western Australian butcher Vince Garreffa on the farm that raises his veal - White Rocks, south of Perth. Celebrated Sydney chef Nino Zoccali, from restaurant Pendolino, explains the joys of using secondary cuts of meat and shows how easy it is to make a beautiful osso buco, rich and full of flavour. Guy goes to the beautiful pine forests of Mount Macedon with chef Aron Michielli to forage for pine forest mushrooms and slippery jacks. Aron takes Guy to his Melbourne restaurant Biricchino to whip up magnificent pappardelle pasta with wild mushrooms.

programme.title: Food Safari Italy
programme.desc: This episode goes to the far western end of Australia to visit the crayfishermen of the stunning Abrolhos Islands off Geraldton. Maeve spends time with Justin Pirrottina to learn how his father and other Italian fishermen came to fish the area, and tastes how good a cray on the barbie can be. Guy pops in on Melbourne chef Maurizio Esposito to learn the secrets of his delicious crayfish gnocchi recipe. Maeve seeks out the best pizza and visits Melbourne pizzaiolo Alessandro DAuria of Pizze e Fichi, who has made thousands of pizzas in his years perfecting the art of pizza. Artichokes are loved throughout Italy and were brought to Australia by growers like the Faranda family in Werribee South on the flat plains outside Melbourne. Joe Faranda shows Guy what to look for to get the best, and Guy then makes delicious stuffed artichokes using a recipe passed on to him by his father. Italian gelato has colonised the worlds tastebuds, and Sicilian gelato-making brothers Ciccio and Salvatore La Rosa from Gelatomassi in Sydney explain why its so good.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Host Eric Adjepong introduces three skilled chefs to take a shot at knocking Chef Alex Guarnaschelli out of the top spot while taking on one of Americas favourite ingredients: cheese.

programme.title: Lust: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
programme.desc: Tiffanie is about to have the wedding of her dreams to her soul mate, the dashing Damon King, founder of King Enterprises. But when Damons old friend Trey arrives, fresh from prison to step in as Damons best man, Tiffanies whole world gets rocked. Sexy and mysterious, Trey triggers a passion in Tiffanie that she never expected, and suddenly the life shes always planned with Damon is uncertain. But Trey still carries wounds from his history with Damon, and his intentions toward both Tiffanie and Damon are not to be trusted.

programme.title: Petals on the Wind
programme.desc: A decade after Cathy, Christopher and Carrie escaped from their grandparents attic at Foxworth Hall, the story continues to follow the twisted plight of the family as they attempt to put their sordid past behind them, but soon discover certain secrets cant be left behind. When Cathy finds herself in an abusive relationship with a fellow dancer, Julian, Christopher and Cathy are forced to face the forbidden feelings they developed for one another while coming of age during captivity.

programme.title: Secrets In The Desert
programme.desc: While on a road trip through the desert, Charlie and her boyfriend Aidan break down in the middle of nowhere. While Aidan waits for a tow truck, Charlie heads to a nearby diner to find help. When Aidan goes missing, Charlie finds herself stranded in a strange town unsure who to trust. The only thing she knows is she might just be their only chance to get out alive.

programme.title: Spinning Out Of Control
programme.desc: Infatuated and obsessed with a fitness instructor, Natalie hatches a devious plan to eliminate everyone in the young womans life so she can have her all to herself.

programme.title: A Chefs Deadly Revenge
programme.desc: A woman moves to a new town and opens her own gourmet restaurant after escaping from an abusive relationship. However, she soon finds herself in a deadly game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: A Kidnapping in Amish Country
programme.desc: When an Amish woman realises her daughter has been kidnapped, she turns to the only person who can help her estranged best friend whos renounced the Amish way of life.

programme.title: Date at Your Own Risk
programme.desc: Eva becomes horrified when she reads an online post where other women accuse her ex-fiance, Will, of harassment and aggressive behaviour. When one of the posters mysteriously disappears, she soon starts to wonder if the stories about Will are true.

programme.title: You Cant Take My Daughter
programme.desc: Amy Thompson is a vibrant law student in Charlotte who is attacked and raped by Demetri, a friend of a friend she met once. Discovering that she is pregnant from the rape, Amy makes the difficult decision to keep her baby, despite the fact that Demetri continues to stalk and harass her as she waits for the long-delayed trial. She gives birth to a beautiful little girl and decides to flee him and start over in Atlanta. Six years later, Demetri finds her and, to her horror, sues her for custody of her daughter. Using her own legal and investigative skills, Amy fights back.

programme.title: Happy Face Killer
programme.desc: Grisly serial killer Keith Hunter Jesperson taunts authorities with scribbled confessions bearing a smiley face at the scenes of his crimes. Based on a true story.

programme.title: An Amish Murder
programme.desc: A woman returns to the Amish farming community of her youth, but her peace is shattered when a murder investigation exposes a dark secret that could destroy her.

programme.title: You Cant Escape Me
programme.desc: An aspiring artist is finally done with her abusive husband. She knows she must start over. She thinks she is safe in Portland with a friend, but she finds herself in danger.

programme.title: Framed by My Husband
programme.desc: When Junes wealthy husband Rick becomes the target of an extortionist who claims he sexually assaulted her, Rick convinces his wife its an act of revenge by a spurned suitor, and enlists her help to prevent the accusations from going public. June agrees to help him pay off the extortionist, but when the woman is found dead, June becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Lets Get Physical
programme.desc: Leading a double life as a fitness instructor and a prostitution ring with a client list, Sadie receives an anonymous tip and soon after her studio is raided by authorities, With only one question: who exactly was on the client list? Based on a true story.

programme.title: Hunt for the Labyrinth Killer
programme.desc: An ace ADA works with a driven cop to catch Daedalus, a serial killer infamous for luring his victims to their deaths with elaborate traps.

programme.title: Am I A Serial Killer?
programme.desc: A teenage girl visits her mum on death row and gets lured into a dangerous trap to take the fall for her mothers crimes.

programme.title: Seeds of Yesterday
programme.desc: The saga of the tormented Dollangangers comes to an end where the family continues to coexist miserably. The film follows Cathys two adult sons, Bart and Jory half-brothers with little in common whose lives are fuelled by deeply troubled relationships, dark secrets and misfortune that come to a head in a way that will haunt the family and its progeny forever.

programme.title: I Was Octomom
programme.desc: In 2009, Natalie Suleman gives birth to eight children with the help of IVF, only to have her life torn apart, and her identity rebranded by the media.

programme.title: Vanished in Death Valley
programme.desc: A teenage girl goes missing after her familys car breaks down in Death Valley. Her parents soon find some unexpected help as they embark on a desperate search to find her.

programme.title: Who Is Killing The Cheerleaders?
programme.desc: Ellie, a former cheerleader, returns to her high school as a teacher ten years after she was nearly killed in a series of brutal slayings on the squad. When the attacks start up again shortly after her arrival, she must find the killer before they get to her first.

programme.title: My Sisters Serial Killer Boyfriend
programme.desc: Maddie, a local reporter investigating a series of killings targeting similar looking women is caught off guard when her younger sister Olivia, is attacked in her own home. Urging on the side of caution, Maddie suggests they take a self defence course. When Olivia starts to fall for their instructor, Maddie becomes sceptical when he refuses to reveal anything about himself, and tries to intervene before the relationship turns into a deadly obsession.

programme.title: Single Black Female 3: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Monica is proven innocent after being wrongfully arrested for murder. As charges are dropped, the police shift focus to Simone, who has vanished while bonding with her daughter Joy.

programme.title: The Killer I Picked Up
programme.desc: When a hardworking single mother starts a side job as a ride share driver to help pay for her daughters college tuition, she becomes the unrelenting obsession of a mysterious rider with a dark past.

programme.title: Abducted In The Everglades
programme.desc: A college student vanishes during spring break in Miami. Her mother, with help from a local boatman, braves dangers to urgently search for her and unravel the mystery.

programme.title: Expecting Amish
programme.desc: When an eventful Rumspringa leads to an unintended pregnancy, Amish teen Hannah must choose between returning to faith and family or beginning a new life elsewhere.

programme.title: Envy: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
programme.desc: Gabrielle Flores has it all - a devoted husband, a beautiful daughter, and one of the best PR firms in the country. When Gabrielles father suddenly reveals she has a half-sister, Keisha, as a result of a brief affair, only - child Gabrielle is delighted to welcome her into her life. But Keisha, who grew up with nothing, wants more than a sisterly bond from Gabrielle - she wants her life, and is willing to do whatever it takes to get it.

programme.title: To Have and to Hold
programme.desc: Alice, who still cant believe her high school crush, the dashing, wealthy and successful Joe, would choose to marry her, willingly allows him to mould her into his ideal socialite wife. Despite Alices best efforts to be the woman of Joes dreams, he cant help but be unfaithful to her. When Joes indiscretions impact his career, Alices life is further turned upside down. Alice unexpectedly finds herself falling for her best friend Emilys boyfriend Harry and begins to wonder if her fairy tale ending could exist after all.

programme.title: Nightmare Tenant
programme.desc: When a woman rents out her college-bound daughters room to a young woman, she doesnt realise that the girl is her daughters vengeful high school rival.

programme.title: V.C Andrews Pearl In The Mist
programme.desc: Fate whisked Ruby from a simple life in the Louisiana Bayou. But her new riches bring more treachery than happiness. Even after a year as a Dumas, Ruby still wonders at the splendor of the familys New Orleans mansion and rejoices in the love of the father she had never known. But true happiness in her new home is as elusive as the swamp mist. Ruby must carefully avoid her venomous stepmother, Daphne, while making every effort to befriend her twin sister, Gisselle. While attending Greenwood, the exclusive girls boarding school, Ruby doesnt lose hope in a world that never really wanted her. Ruby will have to summon every last ounce of her Cajun strength to reclaim her home, her future, and the happiness she once knew.

programme.title: Single Black Female 2
programme.desc: Three years after narrowly escaping the murderous clutches of her half-sister Simone, Monica is ready for a fresh start in Seattle as the host of the citys number one prime-time investigative program.

programme.title: The Lover in the Attic: A True Story
programme.desc: This is the lurid, true story about femme fatale Dolly, her murdered husband, and her lover, Otto - the man in the attic. In the 1930s, Dolly met and seduced her repairman Otto but she was already married to successful business man Fred. Their affair grew so strong that she decided to move him into her attic and keep him as her sex slave, unbeknownst to Fred. Otto lived in Dollys attic for four years, even moving houses with them, until one night during a heated argument between Dolly and Fred, Otto burst downstairs from the attic and killed Fred. Now the two must cover up the murder and try to live a normal life, but will they be able to keep their secret?

programme.title: Girl in the Box
programme.desc: In 1977, 22-year-old Colleen Stan doesnt think twice when she hitch hikes and is picked up by a young couple, Cameron and Janice Hooker. But the life she knows is completely ripped away when the couple abducts her and takes her to their home where Cameron tortures and sexually abuses her. For the next seven years, Colleen is imprisoned for up to 23 hours a day, in a coffin-sized box hidden beneath the couples bed. When not incarcerated, Colleen is part of a strange new life as a live-in slave, babysitter, and victim of Camerons bizarre and extreme sexual fantasies.

programme.title: Murder At The Lighthouse
programme.desc: Fleeing her abusive ex, Jess hires a boat to Canada, but when it sinks, shes rescued by a reclusive lighthouse keeper. As she heals, Jess realises shes fallen into another trap.

programme.title: Murder at the Derby
programme.desc: Kara lands her dream job at a prestigious horse stable under Jennifers mentorship, but tensions rise when Jennifers jealous brother puts everyones lives at risk.

programme.title: No One Would Tell
programme.desc: Laura Collins (Shannen Doherty), single mum to daughter Sarah (Matreya Scarrwener), has had a history of rocky relationships, so when Sarah begins dating the popular and charismatic Rob Tennison (Callan Potter), Laura is thrilled with what she sees. But when it becomes increasingly clear that Rob has a darker, possessive side, Laura lives in a state of denial about her daughters relationship until Sarah goes missing. Laura must find the will to fight for justice for Sarah when a case against Rob is brought to trial and presided over by a powerful judge (Mira Sorvino).

programme.title: Surviving The Sleepover
programme.desc: Outspoken teenager Hannah goes to a sleepover at a popular girls house, not realising she was only invited to be the victim of a prank.

programme.title: Waking Up To Danger
programme.desc: A young mother picks up the pieces after a horrible accident damages her memory. She soon suspects her husbands indiscretions are what caused her suffering and that her family is in danger.

programme.title: Lust: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
programme.desc: Tiffanie is about to have the wedding of her dreams to her soul mate, the dashing Damon King, founder of King Enterprises. But when Damons old friend Trey arrives, fresh from prison to step in as Damons best man, Tiffanies whole world gets rocked. programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: Incompetent detective Frank Drebin has to foil an attempt to assassinate the Queen as he woos Priscilla Presley.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: From Waynes basement, Wayne and Garth broadcast a talk-show called "Waynes World" on local public access television. The show comes to the attention of a sleazy network executive who wants to produce a big-budget version of "Waynes World"-and he also wants Waynes girlfriend, a rock singer named Cassandra. Wayne and Garth have to battle the executive not only to save their show, but also Cassandra.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: The thriller that scared movie fans everywhere out of the water. Three men undertake a perilous journey to hunt down a great white killer shark.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Detroit cop Axel Foley who returns to Beverly Hills, this time to track down bad guys at an amusement park. Judge Reinhold and Bronson Pinchot are also back for this third instalment.

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: After a voice tells a farmer to put a baseball diamond in his cornfield, the ghosts of famous players begin to appear on it.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: Power company repairman Roy Neary witnesses unidentified flying objects in the skies near his Muncie, Indiana home. The encounter sets into action a startling chain of dramatic events. Trying desperately to understand what he has seen, Neary is increasingly driven to the emotional edge by the governmental cover up thats blocking him. With his wife struggling in vain to understand what is happening as their relationship disintegrates, Neary finds an ally in Jillian Guiler, a woman who has also witnessed nocturnal encounters and whose young son has been abducted by the alien visitors. As Roy and Jillian look for an answer to the extraordinary mystery that has engulfed them, an international team of scientists led by Claude Lacombe, a dedicated French expert on extraordinary phenomena, also pursues the truth. As Lacombe and company seek to understand the phenomenon of the skies and look for a communications break-through, their cosmic detective work reaches from the Indiana plains across the world to a remote hillside in India and then to the one place that holds the answer in an ultimate close encounter.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A hilarious, subversive and wickedly scary film about Gizmo the mogwai, a cuddly critter that multiplies with savage consequences. Great special effects and amazingly realistic mechanical creatures.

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: Incompetent detective Frank Drebin has to foil an attempt to assassinate the Queen as he woos Priscilla Presley.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: The thriller that scared movie fans everywhere out of the water. Three men undertake a perilous journey to hunt down a great white killer shark.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Detroit cop Axel Foley who returns to Beverly Hills, this time to track down bad guys at an amusement park. Judge Reinhold and Bronson Pinchot are also back for this third instalment.

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: After a voice tells a farmer to put a baseball diamond in his cornfield, the ghosts of famous players begin to appear on it.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A new, technologically superior Soviet nuclear sub, the Red October, is heading for the US coast under the command of Captain Marko Ramius. The American government thinks Ramius is planning to attack. A lone CIA analyst has a different idea: he thinks Ramius is planning to defect, but he has only a few hours to find him and prove it - because the entire Russian naval and air commands are trying to find him, too. The hunt is on.

programme.title: The Karate Kid (1984)
programme.desc: A new kid in town who is picked on by bullies learns karate and eastern philosophy from Mr Miyagi, and learns how to fight back.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA analyst Jack Ryan travels to London with his wife and child. Upon being caught in the middle of a terrorist attack on a member of the royal family, Ryan helps to thwart the assailants. Ryans courageous act, however, marks him and his family as a target for revenge in the sights of the terrorist whose brother Ryan killed.

programme.title: Memphis Belle
programme.desc: In 1943, the crew of a B-17 based in the UK prepares for its 25th and final bombing mission over Germany before returning home to the USA.

programme.title: Kellys Heroes
programme.desc: A group of US soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Marty McFly, a typical American teenager of the 1980s, is accidentally sent back to 1955 in a plutonium-powered DeLorean time machine, invented by a slightly mad scientist. During his often hysterical but amazing trip back in time, Marty must make certain his teenage parents-to-be meet and fall in love so that he can get back to the future.

programme.title: Back To The Future II
programme.desc: Marty McFly returns, this time travelling forward to 2015 with wacky Doc Brown to save his kids. Their crazy time-travels have a mind-bending effect on history.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A new, technologically superior Soviet nuclear sub, the Red October, is heading for the US coast under the command of Captain Marko Ramius. The American government thinks Ramius is planning to attack. A lone CIA analyst has a different idea: he thinks Ramius is planning to defect, but he has only a few hours to find him and prove it - because the entire Russian naval and air commands are trying to find him, too. The hunt is on.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA analyst Jack Ryan travels to London with his wife and child. Upon being caught in the middle of a terrorist attack on a member of the royal family, Ryan helps to thwart the assailants. Ryans courageous act, however, marks him and his family as a target for revenge in the sights of the terrorist whose brother Ryan killed.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: An orphaned autistic savant who deciphers a government code in a magazine triggers a national security alarm that makes him an assassins target.

programme.title: Innerspace
